long_description: Built with tough nylon and watertight seams, the waterproof Seattle Sports Central Backpack is designed for rugged abuse from cyclists, paddlers and campers alike. Rugged-yet-lightweight coated nylon is PVC-free and seams are radio frequency welded for excellent waterproof protection. 3-roll top closure creates a waterproof main compartment. Outer compartment has splashproof zipper for quick access to keys, phone and wallet. Padded back panel features ventilated design to provide all the comfort at half the weight. Reflective patches.
short_description: Built with tough nylon and watertight seams, the waterproof Seattle Sports Central Backpack is designed for rugged abuse from cyclists, paddlers and campers alike.
